name: Madness (itch) (NightFoxGames)
description:
*Quik note: This is a game made for the Scorespace #23 jam! it was a fun jam and i worked together with music artist DuUaader (https://soundcloud.com/duuuaader) wich was very fun!*

Thanks for seeing the project.*

Madness is a Endless survival tower defense game.

Art, Programming: Nightfox.

Music: DuUaader.

(Tommorow i can add a web build)
